name: jupyter-next
description: Jupyter notebook support for Pulsar with interactive computing, kernel management, and rich output rendering.

jupyterPath.title: Jupyter Path
jupyterPath.description: Path to Jupyter executable. Leave empty for auto-detection.

startupTimeout.title: Kernel Startup Timeout
startupTimeout.description: Maximum time in seconds to wait for kernel to start.

shutdownTimeout.title: Kernel Shutdown Timeout
shutdownTimeout.description: Maximum time in seconds to wait for kernel to shutdown gracefully.

scrollOutput.title: Scroll Long Output
scrollOutput.description: Scroll output cells that exceed a certain height.

maxOutputHeight.title: Max Output Height
maxOutputHeight.description: Maximum height in pixels for output cells before scrolling.

showCellNumbers.title: Show Cell Numbers
showCellNumbers.description: Display execution count numbers on cells.

fontSize.title: Font Size
fontSize.description: Font size for notebook cells (0 = use editor font size).

lineNumbers.title: Show Line Numbers
lineNumbers.description: Display line numbers in code cells.

wordWrap.title: Word Wrap
wordWrap.description: Wrap long lines in code cells.

interruptOnError.title: Interrupt on Error
interruptOnError.description: Stop execution of remaining cells when an error occurs.

clearOutputBeforeRun.title: Clear Output Before Run
clearOutputBeforeRun.description: Clear cell output before running the cell.
